ROOT.BANNER: SELECT DECODE(casvrec, 0, ''WARNING'', ''NORMAL'') as CRITICALITY, DECODE(casvrec, 0, ''Sales load FAILED - Keep doing Cycle Count on Negative and Zero.'', ''Sales loaded successfully - Ok for Cycle Count today.'') as MESSAGE FROM calsite@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE TRUNC(casdate)=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND cassite=:param2
ROOT.QUERY: select stosite STORE_NUM, foucnuf supplier_code, foulibl supplier_desc, pkstrucobj.get_cext@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, dep.strpere) DEPT_CODE, REPLACE(pkstrucobj.get_desc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, dep.strpere, ''HN''),''DEPARTMENT'', '''') DEPT_DESC, pkstrucobj.get_cext@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, sdep.strpere) SUB_DEPT_CODE, REPLACE(pkstrucobj.get_desc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, sdep.strpere, ''HN''),''SUB-DEPT'','''') SUB_DEPT_DESC, pkstrucobj.get_cext@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, cat.strpere) CAT_CODE, pkstrucobj.get_desc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, cat.strpere, ''HN'') CAT_DESC, COUNT(stocinr) OVER ( PARTITION BY cat.strpere ) cnt, NVL(artuv.arvcexr, pkartrac.Get_Artcexr@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, stocinr)) item_code, arvcexv sv, barcode UPC, pkartuv.get_libelle_long@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,arvcinv, ''HN'') SV_DESC, qte qty, NVL(( SELECT ''Yes'' FROM artreap@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE arecinr = stocinr AND aresite = :param2 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN areddeb AND aredfin AND arecomm != 1 and rownum=1),''No'') cgo, NVL((SELECT sum(dcdcoli) from CDEDETCDE@Heinens_Custom_Prod, CDEENTCDE@Heinens_Custom_Prod where ecdcincde=dcdcincde and ecdetat in(1,2,5) and dcdetat in (1,2,5) and dcdcinr=stocinr and ecdsite=:param2 and rownum=1), 0) ORDERED, NVL((SELECT to_char(max(ecddliv),''MM/DD/RR'') from CDEDETCDE@Heinens_Custom_Prod, CDEENTCDE@Heinens_Custom_Prod where ecdcincde=dcdcincde and ecdetat in (1,2,5) and dcdetat in (1,2,5) and dcdcinr=stocinr and ecdsite=:param2 and rownum=1),'''') DELIVERY FROM ( SELECT stosite, qte, decode(qte, 0, 1, 0) zero_stock, decode(qte, 0, 0, 1) neg_stock, NVL((select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from stodetre@Heinens_Custom_Prod where sdrsite = stosite and sdrcinr = stocinr and pkartstock.RecupCinlUVCparCINRetSEQVL@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, stocinr,sdrseqvl) =stocinl and sdrdcre > sysdate - 365)),0) rec_365, NVL( (select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from stomvt@Heinens_Custom_Prod where stmsite = stosite and stmcinl = stocinl and stmdmvt > sysdate - 90 and stmtmvt between 150 and 174)), 0) sold_31, stocinl, stocinr, artetat, foucfin, foucnuf, foulibl, (SELECT arccode FROM artcoca@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE ROWID = (SELECT max(ROWID) FROM artcoca@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stocinl=arccinv AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN arcddeb AND arcdfin)) barcode FROM ( SELECT SUM(NVL(storeai, 0) + NVL(storeal, 0) - NVL(storeav, 0) + NVL(storeae, 0) + NVL(storeac, 0) - NVL(storear, 0)) qte, stocinl, stocinr, artetat, stosite, foucfin, foulibl, foucnuf FROM stocouch@Heinens_Custom_Prod , artrac@Heinens_Custom_Prod, (SELECT aracinr ,araseqvl, foucfin, foulibl, foucnuf ,COUNT(arasite) FROM artuc@Heinens_Custom_Prod , (SELECT foucfin, foulibl, foucnuf FROM foudgene@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE ( foucnuf = ''-1'' OR ''-1'' = ''-1'' )), (SELECT objcint FROM strucrel@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN objddeb AND objdfin CONNECT BY PRIOR objcint = objpere START WITH objpere IN (SELECT sobcint FROM strucobj@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE sobcextin = DECODE(''-1'',''-1'',''1000000000000'',''-1'' )) UNION SELECT sobcint objcint FROM strucobj@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE sobcextin = DECODE(''-1'',''-1'',''1000000000000'',''-1'' )) WHERE aracinr = objcint AND ARATCDE=1 -- AND aracexr=''143989'' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN araddeb AND aradfin AND aratfou = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM reseau@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE arasite = respere AND ressite = :param2 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN resddeb AND resdfin ) AND ( 1 = -1 OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM artreap@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE arecinr = aracinr AND aresite = :param2 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN areddeb AND aredfin AND arecomm != 1)) AND foucfin = aracfin GROUP BY aracinr ,araseqvl, foucfin, foulibl, foucnuf) WHERE stotpos = 0 and stosite = :param2 and aracinr = stocinr and stocinl=pkartstock.RecupCinlUVCparCINRetSEQVL@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, aracinr,araseqvl) AND aracinr = artcinr GROUP BY stocinl, stocinr, artetat, stosite, foucfin, foulibl, foucnuf ) WHERE 0 >= qte ), artuv@Heinens_Custom_Prod, strucrel@Heinens_Custom_Prod, STRUCTURE@Heinens_Custom_Prod cat, STRUCTURE@Heinens_Custom_Prod sdep, STRUCTURE@Heinens_Custom_Prod dep where arvcinv(+) = stocinl and objcint = stocinr and trunc(sysdate) between strucrel.objddeb and strucrel.objdfin and cat.strcint = objpere and cat.strprof = 4 and cat.stridstr = ''1'' and sdep.strcint = objpere and sdep.strprof = 3 and sdep.stridstr = ''1'' and dep.strcint = objpere and dep.strprof = 2 and dep.stridstr = ''1'' and rec_365 = 1 and sold_31 = 1 AND trunc(sysdate) between cat.strddeb and cat.strdfin AND trunc(sysdate) between sdep.strddeb and sdep.strdfin AND trunc(sysdate) between dep.strddeb and dep.strdfin ORDER BY cnt DESC, CAT_CODE, qty ASC, item_code ASC
